column1: 0 1 0 [Question] Hi, how is your day? EOS 0 0 1 Not good. I was told today that my contract is not being renewed once it ends this month. I am very anxious about finding another job during pandemic. EOS 0 1 2 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I see, It' s been a difficult year for all of us. But I think it would be possible to negotiate. EOS 0 0 3 But I tried negotiating. They are down - sizing the entire sales department. What else can I do? EOS 0 1 4 [Reflection of feelings] Hmmm, I can see that this is stressful for you. Did you already search for a new job? EOS 0 0 5 Yes I am preparing my resume but job vacancies are few and far between. I am worried about my next job. EOS 0 1 6 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Okay then, It' s good that you already started. But first of all stop being panicked. EOS 0 0 7 Ok. Do you have any ideas for sales positions? EOS 0 1 8 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Search online and locally, get help from your friends and I assure you if you try hard enough you will suceed. EOS 0 0 9 I will. How can I get help from friends? Only very few are in sales field. EOS 0 1 10 [Providing Suggestions or Information] And remember, what are we if we stop fighting? Your friends can support you emotionally at least and maybe they know a person that could help you. EOS 0 0 11 I agree. I should never give up. But due to financial commitments, I am somewhat afraid of failing. EOS 0 1 12 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Life is full of surprises, but we should get advantage of bad situations. It' s totally fine to be afraid, but also at the same time you should try harder to reach your goal. EOS 0 0 13 Yes, so far life has been kind to me even if it surprised me at few places! I will try to make the most of the situation.. You are right! Hard work will pay. I need to pull my socks up... EOS 0 1 14 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Courage is not the absence of the fear, you should fight to find your place. EOS 0 0 15 Sure, after all I am known to be a fighter!. EOS 0 1 16 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Yeah that' s the spirit. You can and you should get a job, so start right now! EOS 0 0 17 Yes I will. Thanks a lot for the encouragement! I truly appreciate your motivational words. EOS 0 1 18 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Don' t let the stress and fear overcome you, get control and who knows maybe you get a better job. your so welcome dear, I hope I could help you even a little bit.

0 0 0 Hello? Is anyone there? Is anyone there. HELLO? no one is supporting me here..:: twiddles thumbs:: the instructions for the support seeker are incorrect as there is no button that has shown for" the partner' s reasons".. the supporter did not respond. This test is skewed. No one is here to chat with. even after being matched. Ridiculous. hello????? hello? no other messages except my own are showing up. EOS 0 1 1 [Question] Sorry, I had a bad connection. Hello, what can I help you with?

3 0 0 Hello. Hello? EOS 3 1 1 [Question] hey how are you doing?. EOS 3 0 2 Doing alright, thanks. Yourself? EOS 3 1 3 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Doing fine, thank you.. EOS 3 0 4 Good to hear. EOS 3 1 5 [Question] What brings you here today? EOS 3 0 6 I' ve been feeling very down lately. EOS 3 1 7 [Question] That sounds difficult, Would you like to elaborate on that? EOS 3 0 8 Sure. I feel depressed about the state of the US and of the rest of the world. It' s very overwhelming.. EOS 3 1 9 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That is completely understandable, there are a lot of overwhelming things going on right now. EOS 3 0 10 Yes and a lot of uncetainty. EOS 3 1 11 [Self-disclosure] Most definitely, I' ve also been feeling a bit overwhelmed by what' s going on. How have you been coping?

0 0 0 Hello. EOS 0 1 1 [Question] hello, how are you doing and how was your night? EOS 0 0 2 It' s been tough. I' ve been looking for a job for months, but feel like I' m getting nowhere. EOS 0 1 3 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] I' m sorry to hear that but if i may hear your you clearly, what you are saying is that you don' t have any job for a long time now. EOS 0 0 4 Well, I am fortunate to have a job, but I am seeking a different job because the one I have does not pay what my skills are worth. It barely pays enough for me to pay my essential bills. EOS 0 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] ok, that is a bit of relief. have u check for job vacancy in your state. EOS 0 0 6 I have, but there are few decent jobs out there. Most available jobs are in locations where one can not drive safely or their personal safety is at risk. EOS 0 1 7 [Reflection of feelings] oh, safety is everything. have you ever consider changing your location. i once change my location to pursue my goal and it pan out well. EOS 0 0 8 Last week, I submitted an application package for my dream job. I have over 15 years of experience and the employer offers housing( which I have seen before, and it is quite nice). I have heard nothing at all. I would have to relocate 4 hours away, but I would do it in a heartbeat for this job. EOS 0 1 9 [Affirmation and Reassurance] wow, i pray that work out. i believe it will work out. EOS 0 0 10 What makes this job so special to me is that it is not like a regular job: it is at a conference center resort owned by my church denomination. I have attended religious retreats there and am now in the process of seeking a new confirmation into this church because it is a different church than that of my childhood. Working there would be ministry, not typical work. And because the majority of staff and guests are from one of our sister churches, one is working mostly with friends and building long relationships. EOS 0 1 11 [Affirmation and Reassurance] wow, that' s a big deal. i know you might not be the only one fighting for this position but i trust you will get it. EOS 0 0 12 Thank you. I believe there are three things in my favor: I know the job well, as I became friends with the person I would be replacing, My pastor wrote a glowing reference, and I was also able to get a reference from the person who trained me for my current( related) job fifteen years ago. EOS 0 1 13 [Providing Suggestions or Information] even by working there, you will surely meet new friends. do you know many people from the church? EOS 0 0 14 We worked together for almost 13 years before she retired, but who would be in a better position to assess my skill than my trainer/ work partner? I know a few of the higher ups from the area churches, and a handful of families. I know half the core staff I would be working with daily and think of them as extended family.. EOS 0 1 15 [Providing Suggestions or Information] you just have to be patient and don' t push it too hard so that you won' t look desperate. EOS 0 0 16 The benefits are nice, also, such as staff are provided meals prepared by the banquet chef and his team when at work. And though everyone has a role, the office staff support each other well and work as a team. EOS 0 1 17 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] wow, banquet at work. that is a wonderland stuff. EOS 0 0 18 At the risk of preaching religion, I believe God may be calling me to serve there.. EOS 0 1 19 [Affirmation and Reassurance] that is definitely a dream job. God is everywhere. just put your trust in Him. He never sleep nor slumber. EOS 0 0 20 When off duty, staff are encouraged to enjoy the facilities and mingle with guests. There is an Olympic sized pool, field games, a gymnasium, an exercise room, and if off duty, one can attend most any of the events on the campus, unless designated as a private event. EOS 0 1 21 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] wow! Olympic size pool. Keep praying. the job is yours. EOS 0 0 22 Because my job is to sell repeat business, it is essential that I get out and meet guests and make certain that their needs are met, but it usually comes in the form of serving snacks at intermission and saying hellos as one passes. It would feel like a family reunion, but in a family where everyone gets along. EOS 0 1 23 [Reflection of feelings] that is good, i work in such place where everyone is like a family.
0 0 0 Hello! How are you today? EOS 0 1 1 [Question] Hello, what seems to be on your mind?.

0 1 0 [Question] Hello how are you doing today? EOS 0 0 1 Am ok but feeling sad and anxious. EOS 0 1 2 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] I' m sorry to hear that you are sad and anxious. Do you know what is causing you to feel that way? EOS 0 0 3 Yes. I recently lost my childhood best friend to covid 19. EOS 0 1 4 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] I can only imagine how sad you feel from losing your best friend. Hopefully chatting some will help. I know in the past when I lost someone it was nice to just have a conversation to help put my mind at ease.

3 0 0 Hi. I am Mike. Live in central Kansas and have been very depressed. EOS 3 1 1 [Question] I' m sorry to hear that, is there a particular reason or instance for you feeling this way? EOS 3 0 2 I lost my job due to Covid and they have shut down for good. no jobs around here and no vehicle so i feel hopeless and hate my living situation. just before covid hit i was saving to move... but then job closed. EOS 3 1 3 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Yes that is a very tough situation, Covid has real placed a large amount of stress through out the world. There may be a ray of hope however with a possible vaccine in the near future, maybe this will be back to normal soon and new jobs will become available. EOS 3 0 4 I hope so and that is what i know mentally. but emotionally it is hard. i just hate having no job, being at home, no money, no vehicle, and a very bad idea to date since there is a high contagious pandemic. EOS 3 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I understand and you are right it is a a lot of mental stress. Have you reached out to claim unemployment or go to a food pantry? During this pandemic you should not feel shameful to take advantage of these services, there are alot of people who have to ask for help for the first time in their lives. EOS 3 0 6 I did not make enough to get unemployment they said. I have not tried a food pantry but that is a great idea. what makes this difficult is I am in a very small town. like we dont wal marts or McDonalds or anything like that. Whole town closes at 9. the closest actual city is 45 miles away. EOS 3 1 7 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Well please try the food pantry and see what they have to offer. Is there anyone whom you could ask for a ride in the future when they go to the bigger city? EOS 3 0 8 I will try food pantry. my sister goes to the city once a month, we shop for the month and i stay with my siter. EOS 3 1 9 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Well its seem that you now have a plan try it out see how it works, hopefully this will get back to normal sooner than later and life may go back to somewhat normal and your stress level and mental exhaustion will also subside. Is there anything else you would like to talk about? EOS 3 0 10 Well I have been wanting a relationship. and i normally dont feel that way at all. and past week i think how much i kind of should have a family as I am 37 but not sure if i truly want that or i just miss human contact as i have only been around family and not gone out at all except to walk and go to store in town, and am confused if it is actully me wanting somone in my life or just a physical thing. EOS 3 1 11 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I think your exactly right, human contact is now a premium and I' m sure you miss that contact that we were once so use to. Missing the contact makes you realize how much you enjoy the company of others. Take it slow and once the vaccine is out ease your way back into the dating scene and see if a relationship is what you really wanted after all. EOS 3 0 12 yeah i mean emotionally i want to go maybe try a date or two or even just an adult night out but know logically it is a VERY risky idea. And that I need to not do anything like that till next year at the minimum. I do appreciate the advice and ideas. EOS 3 1 13 [Others] Remember that age is only a number and love will no no number, we are hear to listen and support you so if you ever need to talk just know we are a mouse click away. EOS 3 0 14 And appreciate that especially during the current situation. EOS 3 1 15 [Greeting] Your welcome stay strong. EOS 3 0 16 You as well. EOS 3 1 17 [Greeting] Thank you.

2 0 0 hi. EOS 2 1 1 [Greeting] Hey! How are you? EOS 2 0 2 trying to stay positive but keep having too many thoughts at once:( EOS 2 1 3 [Question] What are these thoughts?:) EOS 2 0 4 Its so stupid. I keep worrying about worrying or having something bad happen. The thoughts just come so fast. EOS 2 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Maybe your mind is just congested with the thoughts of life, and you just need to relax for a little while. EOS 2 0 6 tried that. its become more of a chronic thing, like sometimes I cant controll the thoughts or like I dont know how to relax. like a chemical thing. EOS 2 1 7 [Affirmation and Reassurance] A chemical thing, so maybe you need a counsellor, and then he can assess your problem, and everything will be alright:) EOS 2 0 8 I have one and it helps sometimes. I try to meditate. EOS 2 1 9 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Yes, meditation is very good at calming down the mind. Does it help you? If it does maybe do it more continuously and more frequently. EOS 2 0 10 i pretty much have to do it constantly. EOS 2 1 11 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Not constantly. because then you won' t have anytime to do anything else, but if negative thoughts always come into your head, maybe try doing something you enjoy doing.
0 0 0 I am very worried about losing my job. EOS 0 1 1 [Question] Hello - How are you today?

6 0 0 Hello, how are you? EOS 6 1 1 [Question] Hi there! How may I support you? EOS 6 0 2 Well, I' m really upset with my friends. EOS 6 1 3 [Others] I am so sorry to hear that. Did something happen? EOS 6 0 4 Yes, they aren' t taking COVID seriously. EOS 6 1 5 [Self-disclosure] Oh that is so hard. I have family that isn' t taking COVID seriously as well, and its so frustrating to see. Are you able to talk to them about your concerns? EOS 6 0 6 Yes but they get angry with me. I don' t know how to get through to them, EOS 6 1 7 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Some people express their frustrations in certain ways. Do you think there is another way to communicate with them? It' s also okay to stand up for yourself and stand by what you feel is right. EOS 6 0 8 I really don' t know I just haven' t been seeing them at all but I see through social media that they have large parties but I do feel left out. It' s a weird dynamic. EOS 6 1 9 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] It sounds like you' re finding it hard to balance the isolation you feel during this pandemic, while you know it' s the safest option, with the social gatherings your friends are having. Does that sound right? EOS 6 0 10 That' s exactly right. EOS 6 1 11 [Affirmation and Reassurance] that is such a hard position to be in. it sounds like you are doing your best by choosing to be safe and keep your distance. EOS 6 0 12 I' d like to think so but I wish they would too. It' s hard to know what is right. EOS 6 1 13 [Self-disclosure] I have found that having vitural movie nights, or going on socially distanced walks with my pals has been so helpful with staying connected. Is this something you think your friends would be willing to try? EOS 6 0 14 Yes, but they' ll have their BBQs and parties anyway. They are having a group Thanksgiving and there will be a lot of people there. My husband and I feel bad that we aren' t going, but we also know it isn' t smart. EOS 6 1 15 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I think a lot of people are going by the notion that you can' t live your life in fear, and that they' re going to have these big family gathering regardless of what is happening with COVID. The stats have shown that after holidays the cases have surged, for example, memorial day, 4th of July, labor day. But I think its important to remember the bigger picture that peoples lives are literally at stake and the people that disregard need to be more aware. EOS 6 0 16 We feel like after this is all over, they will still remind us that we were standoffish during this time. And I agree. The longer we put it off and don' t take it seriously, the longer it will last. EOS 6 1 17 [Reflection of feelings] Can you tell them that that just isn' t the case? You and your husband are making the right choice by staying home for the safety of yourselves and others. If I am correct, it has nothing to do with the fact that you don' t want to see your pals and family! From chatting with you it sounds like your relationships with these people is incredibly important to you. EOS 6 0 18 Yes that' s totally accurate. Yes they are. They are good people. They just think living for the moment is the bigger picture. EOS 6 1 19 [Greeting] I hope your friends can see how important they are to you and thats a huge reason why you' re not seeing them. EOS 6 0 20 I think they do. They just think that this is a hoax. EOS 6 1 21 [Self-disclosure] I know a lot of people that think the same thing. I have one friend who thought that, and they ended up contracting COVID. Thankfully she was ok, but after she got it she definitely didn' t think it was a hoax anymore. I hope they understand the risk they are taking. EOS 6 0 22 That' s scary. Yeah I don' t think they get it. EOS 6 1 23 [Greeting] I am proud of the choices you are making and I hope you can take some comfort in knowing that you are doing your part in helping keep things under control. There is a strength in numbers and the more people who understand that the faster it can be controlled. EOS 6 0 24 Thank you. I hope it gets better. But anyway thank you for giving me the chance to open up. EOS 6 1 25 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Yes of course, I hope this was helpful. You are doing the best you can and take pride in knowing that.:)

6 0 0 hi my friend. EOS 6 1 1 [Reflection of feelings] Hello! How are you doing? EOS 6 0 2 feeling very shame. EOS 6 1 3 [Question] Oh my god! What happened? EOS 6 0 4 i have cheated on my girlfriend. EOS 6 1 5 [Reflection of feelings] I feel sorry for you.. What was the reason behind that? I understand how you are feeling right now. EOS 6 0 6 me and my girlfriend mom had an physical relationship but till now my girlfriend belives im good guy. EOS 6 1 7 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Calm down friend. EOS 6 0 8 what should i do now. EOS 6 1 9 [Question] Can i know the reason why you got attracted to her mom when she herself is there? Chill out friend, feel good atleast now you have realised your mistake. Whatever happened has happened, forget everything. EOS 6 0 10 i have gone to her home. her mom taken advantage to me what should i dothat time so we did it. EOS 6 1 11 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I understand, so now forget from beng guilty. EOS 6 0 12 but till now my girlfriend dont know about it but her mom is now targeting me for her sexual desire. EOS 6 1 13 [Providing Suggestions or Information] You have got such a nice girlfriend, have a happy life with her. EOS 6 0 14 but think about her mom how could i handle her. EOS 6 1 15 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Dont worry, just tell your girlfriend directly about the incident of how her mom is behaving towards you with a proof if you could. Or else be bold enough to warn her mom regarding this. EOS 6 0 16 yes im going to warn her. EOS 6 1 17 [Reflection of feelings] You have such a nice girlfriend my dear friend, so cheating her is not at all fair. Yes, go ahead, the problems will vanish. EOS 6 0 18 yeah i can understand. EOS 6 1 19 [Reflection of feelings] And i believe you too are good, as you have realised your mistake, so stop worrying or feeling guilty for the act. Be happy:) EOS 6 0 20 sure i will try to solve my problem. EOS 6 1 21 [Others] Thats the spirit:) EOS 6 0 22 give any tips to warn her my friend. EOS 6 1 23 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Just be bold enough, dont get aroused or attracted to her by any way even though she' s seducing you, be harsh towards her, because you will have to teach a better lesson to her. Tell her, if she repeats this, then you are either gonna tell it to your girlfriend or either file a complaint against her.
2 0 0 hi. EOS 2 1 1 [Greeting] Hey! How are you? EOS 2 0 2 trying to stay positive but keep having too many thoughts at once:( EOS 2 1 3 [Question] What are these thoughts?:)

4 1 0 [Question] HI there, How are you doing today? EOS 4 0 1 Its hard for me to find a job. things could be doing better. it' s been a bad week for me. EOS 4 1 2 [Self-disclosure] I understand that, it is hard to find a job. I got terminated during the beginning of covid. EOS 4 0 3 Yea, i got laid off in July. the market has been tough. EOS 4 1 4 [Self-disclosure] I actually took a job at walmart just to make ends meet. Not the best situation but hey, my family can eat. EOS 4 0 5 thats good. i' m an engineer and i would like to take another engineering role. but they are hard to come by now adays. EOS 4 1 6 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Yea, would you consider doing something lesser for now just to make sure you have some income coming in? Or do you still collect unemployment at least? EOS 4 0 7 yes, i still get some unemployment which helps. i' ve done many interviews. EOS 4 1 8 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Thats good at least. Well, its great you are being proactive about it! I hate saying this but, just hang in there and keep moving on. EOS 4 0 9 yes. so i' m hoping to find something soon before the holidays. yes thank you. i just want to be able to buy presents for my family. and make it to 2021. EOS 4 1 10 [Others] I hear ya, im doing everything i can to make a bit of extra money just so my kid can have a semi normal christmas!

3 0 0 Hi. EOS 3 1 1 [Question] Hi there, how are you feeling? EOS 3 0 2 Not feeling good. Trying to find a job but no success. EOS 3 1 3 [Question] It' s a really hard time to be finding new work isn' t it? Are you getting unemployment or anything? EOS 3 0 4 I am getting unemployment but that is not sufficient with 6 children. EOS 3 1 5 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Wow that' s a lot of kids. Do you know that there are foodbanks out there which might be able to help you?

4 0 0 Hi I am so sad my boyfriend was cheating and broke up with me when I found out. I don' t think I can ever be happy again. EOS 4 1 1 [Reflection of feelings] I am sorry to hear that. reading your opening statement it sounds like you are now suffering from low self - esteem is that true?
1 0 0 Hello. EOS 1 1 1 [Question] Hello how are you? EOS 1 0 2 Not so good. How are you doing? EOS 1 1 3 [Question] I am doing okay thank you for asking! would you like to talk about whats wrong?

4 1 0 [Question] how are yo. EOS 4 0 1 Good how are you. EOS 4 1 2 [Question] ok. thanks for asking. what on your mind. EOS 4 0 3 Just been having a rough time.... recently broke up with my girlfriend. EOS 4 1 4 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] sounds hard. are you doing anything to help. EOS 4 0 5 Trying to avoid thoughts about her, but every where on social media she is posting about her new guy. It is hard to escape the sadness. EOS 4 1 6 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] wow. in our connected world it is hard to get away. do you want to tell me how it happened. EOS 4 0 7 Yeah it is. Well we have been having trouble staying closely connected since the lockdown. We tried to make time for one another, but it has been tough. I was the one who broke things off because I know longer felt much love coming from her. I felt neglected and I thought a break up was the best solution. I did not think she would pick up a new guy two weeks later. I was not prepared to deal with this kind of pain and it hurts. EOS 4 1 8 [Affirmation and Reassurance] It was wise of you to know your feeling towards the relationship and make a mature decision for the both of you. During this pandemic too. that must have been even harder.. EOS 4 0 9 Yeah it has been difficult and I know I will make it through. It is just difficult to get through break ups these days. Unless you disconnect you can' t avoid the other person. EOS 4 1 10 [Reflection of feelings] that' s a good idea. Have you thought about disconnecting? EOS 4 0 11 Yeah I was thinking of maybe organizing a hunting/ fishing/ camping trip with my buddies over winter break. That could help get me out of the digital world and would help me spend quality time with my friends. EOS 4 1 12 [Affirmation and Reassurance] nothing better than the outdoors wit h some friends. Fresh air can really clear the mind. EOS 4 0 13 Yeah I think that is probably what I will end up doing. It will probably help the mental health of the entire friend group, but especially me right now. EOS 4 1 14 [Reflection of feelings] perspective is found from looking at things from a distance. you maybe to close to everything right now to see the forest from the trees.

4 0 0 Hello. EOS 4 1 1 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I am here. How are you? I feel that I can really help you on this Christmas Night. EOS 4 0 2 Not too well. I am feeling pretty down right now. EOS 4 1 3 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] How long have you not been feeling not so well? EOS 4 0 4 Today was my one - year anniversary with my boyfriend. He broke up with me today. We were at school( our college campus), and we had a huge fight. EOS 4 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Well, I can tell you that it is hard, but it could be a god send in the long run. EOS 4 0 6 Maybe I can think that way in time, but right now I don' t know what to do with myself. EOS 4 1 7 [Self-disclosure] Well, I have been in rough relationships, but there is no need to add additional trauma to the situation. EOS 4 0 8 I probably should have seen it coming, we have been fighting a lot lately. That' s true, but that doesn' t make me feel any better about it right now. EOS 4 1 9 [Affirmation and Reassurance] It' s really hard during the Christmas Holidays, but there are ways to decompress. EOS 4 0 10 Yes, everything can feel worse this time of year because of the stress of the holidays. EOS 4 1 11 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Have you considered doing meditation to release negative thoughts? EOS 4 0 12 I have actually read about that, but I have a hard time focusing when I meditate. I suppose I just need to practice more. EOS 4 1 13 [Providing Suggestions or Information] There are online resources to help you get in a better frame of mind. EOS 4 0 14 Like the Calm app? EOS 4 1 15 [Providing Suggestions or Information] There are incense burning kits that can help to relieve stress and trauma. Yes, the Calm app is one. EOS 4 0 16 I like incense, but it makes my allergies act up unfortunately. What else can I do besides meditation? EOS 4 1 17 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] You said that you are allergic to incenses of all kinds? EOS 4 0 18 Most types of incense are too strongly scented and make me sneeze or feel sick. Candles are much better for me. EOS 4 1 19 [Providing Suggestions or Information] There are websites like Decompress dot org that can help with relationships that are in turmoil. EOS 4 0 20 I haven' t heard of that website before. I' ll have to check it out. EOS 4 1 21 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I used to visit sites that help people who need to find ways to decompress after issues and fights have occurred in relationships. EOS 4 0 22 Well, I haven' t been in a long - term relationship like this before.. My past relationships were all in high school, and they only lasted a few weeks or months at a time. I really cared for this one, and we were together for so long. EOS 4 1 23 [Reflection of feelings] I feel obligated to help during Christmas because I had a nasty fight with my partner one year over gifts. EOS 4 0 24 You had a fight with your partner? I' m sorry, it' s the worst when people fight over what' s supposed to be something nice. EOS 4 1 25 [Question] What was the fight over? Food? Money? Sex? EOS 4 0 26 I forget what started it, it was something stupid. He didn' t like the way I said something and it kind of blew up from there. We were fighting over the smallest things these last few months. It just kind of built up to the point where he said he couldn' t take fighting with me anymore and just wanted to end it. EOS 4 1 27 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I would let things decompress for a long while. EOS 4 0 28 End the relationship, I mean. You think maybe if we just take some time apart, he might want to talk about it? EOS 4 1 29 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I suggest thinking through ending the relationship if he has a hot temper..

0 1 0 [Question] Hello! How are you doing? EOS 0 0 1 im ok kinda stressed. EOS 0 1 2 [Question] Anything I can help with:)? Feeling stressed is never fun:( What has been making you feel stressed? EOS 0 0 3 im feeling very overwhelmed and cant get anything done cause i dont know where to start! i want to declutter my house but dont know where to start. EOS 0 1 4 [Reflection of feelings] I hear you, feeling overwhelmed and like you don' t know where to start can leave a person feeling stressd forsure! Decluttering sounds like a great idea! Sometimes taking baby steps is a good place to start! EOS 0 0 5 but there are so many thinggs to do and ideas i have. EOS 0 1 6 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] Of course! It can feel so stressful when we have all these little things we want to do but don' t know where to start! EOS 0 0 7 should i start in one room or one group of things and collect them from all the rooms? EOS 0 1 8 [Question] What is one little area that maybe seems easier to start with? Yeah, that' s a great idea! EOS 0 0 9 well i seem to start and them i end up jumoing to another thing! jumping. EOS 0 1 10 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Hey, well that' s okay! starting is half the battle, so that' s an accomplishment right there! EOS 0 0 11 thanx that helps cause i start feeling defeated. EOS 0 1 12 [Providing Suggestions or Information] have you tried maybe using a timer or making a list to help keep you focused on decluttering one area at a time? Of course! It' s easy to be hard on ourselves, but just the fact that you are trying is so important!
4 1 0 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Hai. EOS 4 0 1 Hai. My name is Tom and i really need your help. EOS 4 1 2 [Affirmation and Reassurance] ok tell me.

3 0 0 I was reallly worried in this suitation. EOS 3 1 1 [Question] Hi, i' m sean, hows your day going. EOS 3 0 2 Was not so good. EOS 3 1 3 [Question] Tell me about the situation. EOS 3 0 4 How was your day. EOS 3 1 5 [Others] Boring. EOS 3 0 6 It really very stress full and depressed situation. Why your day is boring. EOS 3 1 7 [Question] Don' t worry about my day, i' m 34 and retired i do this to help people, tell me about your situation. EOS 3 0 8 My suitaion is really very sad and depressed. EOS 3 1 9 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] I was a homeless drug addicted junkie for over 10 years. Tell me how yours is worse sweety. Tell me why you are so sad and depressed. EOS 3 1 11 [Providing Suggestions or Information] There are many reasons people have depression. It is a recognised medical condition and the good news is that there is help out there. EOS 3 1 15 [Providing Suggestions or Information] if people care about you then they will be happy to give you the time and listen to how you are feeling at the moment. EOS 3 1 17 [Providing Suggestions or Information] everyone has problems and it is good to talk about them because a problem shared is a problem halved. EOS 3 1 19 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I also think that it will be worse to get in touch with your doctor or a medical professional. these people are trained to deal with problems like yours and will be able to offer effective Solutions from a medical perspective. EOS 0 1 8 [Question] What are you missing most? Friends? EOS 0 0 9 A balance in life. I spend so much time online. I' m always staring at a screen. I would like to get aware from the computer. EOS 0 1 10 [Providing Suggestions or Information] As the vaccination started, I believe we will be back to normal soon.. EOS 0 0 11 Yeah, I can' t wait for things to return to normal. EOS 0 0 13 No, I haven' t. I thought it wouldn' t be the same as really hanging out. I don' t drink. I do like to play board games though. EOS 0 1 14 [Providing Suggestions or Information] It will not be same.. but better than being alone..

1 0 0 My boyfriend broke up with me. EOS 1 1 1 [Question] Hello there, how are you?. EOS 1 0 2 I' m very upset. He yelled and yelled at me. EOS 1 1 3 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] Your relationship has ended? I am very sorry about that. And your boyfriend ended it? That was really wrong of him if you ask me. I think you might be better off without him. EOS 1 0 4 Yes, after seeing him act this way I agree. He said I was worthless. EOS 1 1 5 [Self-disclosure] I have been in this position myself and I know how painful it is but it turned out for the best for me - I now have a great relationship! EOS 1 0 6 Well that' s good for you, but I' m so mad right now I can' t see straight! EOS 1 1 7 [Others] Noone has the right to put you down like that. You really are better off without him. EOS 1 0 8 I know. I do deserve better. But I was with him a very long time. EOS 1 1 9 [Question] Can you think of something to do that will take your mind off him? How long were the two of you together? EOS 1 0 10 More than a year, but I' ve known him since childhood. That' s what makes me so mad! EOS 1 1 11 [Affirmation and Reassurance] He should not be treating you that way when you' ve known one another so long! EOS 1 0 12 All those years of friendship down the drain. Should I call him? EOS 1 1 13 [Others] I think that you should call one of your girlfriends and suggest you have a movie night. It would make you feel better. EOS 1 0 14 But all of my friends are still friends with him! And they took his side! EOS 1 1 15 [Others] Oh that is rough. That happened to me too when I broke up with my ex. EOS 1 0 16 How did you get through it? EOS 1 1 17 [Question] They all took his side? Not one took yours? EOS 1 0 18 Not one! EOS 1 1 19 [Self-disclosure] I tried to find some new interests. One thing I did was take a salsa class.. that was a great way to meet new people. EOS 1 0 20 I' m not much of a dancer, but that might be a way to meet new people. EOS 1 1 21 [Others] There are lots of other things you could do. Maybe you could take an evening class in something that interests you? EOS 1 0 22 He' s a teacher, so taking a class might remind me of him. EOS 1 1 23 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I think also you need to think a bit more highly of yourself and not let idiots like this treat you so badly. EOS 1 0 24 But maybe I deserved it. EOS 1 1 25 [Others] he seems to have damaged your self esteem badly. EOS 1 0 26 Yes, he did. EOS 1 1 27 [Providing Suggestions or Information] No you did not! Please don' t think like that. EOS 1 0 28 I' m just so angry that I could break something. And maybe I will do that! EOS 1 1 29 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I think that that is a normal reaction to feeling ill treated. I hope that it will pass soon and am sure that it will. There are a lot of therapy groups available that might be able to help you through this. EOS 1 0 30 But what if it doesn' t pass? And I cannot afford therapy. EOS 1 1 31 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I think you really need to take it one day at a time. Things are very raw for you right now. There are some organisations that will offer a certain number of sessions for free. EOS 1 0 32 I don' t know if I could do that. I don' t like talking about my problems with strangers. EOS 1 1 33 [Self-disclosure] And yet here we are: P. Therapy can be surprisingly beneficial, I have found.. I do realise that it can be hard to open up to how we are feeling though. I know that I was. EOS 1 0 34 Do you have any suggestions about how to open up to people I don' t know? EOS 1 1 35 [Others] I think that is useful to remember that we are all human and that most people have been hurt in this way at some point. No - one will be judging you. EOS 1 0 36 That' s what I am afraid of. Being judged by people. EOS 1 1 37 [Question] Do you think that this might partly because your ex has eroded your self esteem?. EOS 1 0 38 Probably. He called me a lot of names. EOS 1 1 39 [Others] The important thing is to gradually rebuild your self esteem. Do you have any things that you excel at?. EOS 1 0 40 I' m good at bowling. And I like riding horses. EOS 1 1 41 [Others] Animals are a wonderful source of comfort when we are feeling very low! Could you join a riding club to make some new friends? EOS 1 0 42 Maybe I will do that. Horses are so cool. EOS 1 1 43 [Reflection of feelings] I can feel that you are starting to make progress already and are thinking of things that you can do post break up. EOS 1 0 44 I sure am. Thanks for your help. EOS 1 1 45 [Greeting] You are most welcome. Is there anything else you would like to talk to me about?

1 0 0 I' m qualified for a promotion but my boss is refusing to promote me based on biased feedback he has received from someone else. EOS 1 1 1 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] It sounds like you are having a hard time because your boss isn' t willing to consider you for a promotion, is that right? EOS 1 0 2 Yes that' s right. It' s frustratgn.* frustrating. EOS 1 1 3 [Self-disclosure] Have you talked to anyone else at work about it? I was in a similar situation once, I confided in a co - worker that I trusted and it gave me a different perspective. EOS 1 0 4 Unfortunately I can' t really talk to anyone at work because there is no one I trust to this extent. Promotions are a bit of a sensitive issue. EOS 1 1 5 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Have you reported to your HR department the issue around biased feedback being used as a determining factor in not being considered? EOS 1 0 6 The HR department favours managers so I am worried that will damage my chances of promotion further. EOS 1 1 7 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I' m sorry you have to deal with this at work. I think you deserve the promotion because you are very dedicated. EOS 1 0 8 Thanks, that' s good to hear. EOS 1 1 9 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I think if you continue to advocate for yourself in a positive manner you could possibly increase the chances of being considered for the promotion. EOS 1 0 10 It' s hard to be positive when I feel like my manager is not receptive to my opinions and just trusts the feedback given by this one other person. EOS 1 1 11 [Self-disclosure] I' ve worked at a place that seems similar to your work environment. My co - workers were not supportive and I was always overlooked. Eventually, I realized that the environment was toxic and chose to start applying for different jobs. I felt like if my potential couldn' t be appreciated then I should go somewhere with opportunities for growth. EOS 1 0 12 Maybe it is time for me to start looking elsewhere for better opportunities. I' ve worked at this place so long that I have become comfortable here and the thought of searching for a new job is intimidating. EOS 1 1 13 [Affirmation and Reassurance] You' ve got this! It' s easy to become comfortable in what we know but, change causes us to grow. EOS 1 0 14 Yeah I agree, it' s uncomfortable and difficult though! I haven' t searched for a new job in so long, I feel like I will perform terribly at the interviews. EOS 1 1 15 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Just start slowly and remember that you can be picky about what position you chose. I also think we all feel like we perform badly during interviews. Preparation is key. I hope discussing your work situation today has made you feel a bit better! EOS 1 0 16 It has, thanks for being supportive and listening to my problem. EOS 1 1 17 [Greeting] It was my pleasure! Thank you for sharing with me. I' m glad I had the opportunity.

EOS 1 1 10 [Providing Suggestions or Information] What was the business? It depends on your location but I' m sure just on the transaction alone that shows some kind of intent. or text messages saying it was for a specific purpose? EOS 1 0 11 A cat cafe. EOS 1 1 12 [Providing Suggestions or Information] If you gave her a large amount of money and have any kind of messages about it I would look into trying to get it back. EOS 1 0 13 I gave her 80K. I' m sorry this has happened thats horrible. EOS 1 0 15 It is. I don' t want to go to the police. I think they are all corrupt and raciest. I would not call the police because you willingly gave it to her. I would hire a lawyer to handle it.

3 1 0 [Greeting] Hello. EOS 3 0 1 Hello, I am looking for help in managing some depression. EOS 3 1 2 [Affirmation and Reassurance] You' ve come to a good place to start. Sometimes being clear with your own expectations can help him to see what won' t be accepted from him as long as he is living in your home.

My husband just got me a daytimer, and I write my goals in that for the new year, and I try to check it every day and try to focus on moving forward, because life has a way of throwing us curveballs like this, and we can' t get stuck in them. That way you open up yourself to make new friends. I have had to walk away from many unhealthy relationships over the years, it isn' t easy, but it' s part of maturing in life.

3 1 0 [Greeting] Hello. EOS 3 0 1 Hello, I am looking for help in managing some depression. EOS 3 1 2 [Affirmation and Reassurance] You' ve come to a good place to start. Is there something in particular that is leaving you feeling depressed? EOS 3 0 3 I am feeling resentful towards my husband for quitting his job, and my son for being the reason that he quit his job.. My son' s behavior is causing a lot of conflict in our house and my husband not working is putting a lot of financial stress on us. EOS 3 1 4 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] I' m sorry to hear that. Feeling resentment for both your husband' s loss of work and your son' s loss of his job is entirely understandable. EOS 3 0 5 I have a hard time not dwelling on the negative things going on. It' s hard to see anything positive or feel hopeful for the future. EOS 3 1 6 [Self-disclosure] I have an adult son who also lost his job recently, and I understand the added stress that can cause in your household. That is a really difficult position to be in. EOS 3 0 7 My son is very defiant and argues with us about everything we try and get him to do, but he expects us to give him money for fun things that he wants to do when he isn' t willing to work or even help out around the house. EOS 3 1 8 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Regardless of what your husband' s actions are and your son' s, could you possibly make the time to do things to support yourself, that even momentarily would provide you with some positive feelings? EOS 3 0 9 I try to go for a run every night, that does help.. EOS 3 1 10 [Reflection of feelings] That is very hard emotionally, so I am sorry you have to deal with your son' s behavior. EOS 3 0 11 It is hard to keep my emotions separate from what is going on with him. EOS 3 1 12 [Providing Suggestions or Information] That is very understandable! Setting boundaries for yourself may help. Even when it' s difficult, being clear with your son that you will not be giving him money could help. Sometimes being clear with your own expectations can help him to see what won' t be accepted from him as long as he is living in your home. EOS 3 0 13 Yes, I could do better at that. I want him to have fun and do things with friends, but I want him to be willing to work for what he wants, too.. I do struggle with expectations. I want him to be someone that he is not willing to be, I need to let go of that and just let him be himself and not base my emotions on his choices. EOS 3 1 14 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] I completely understand that. Especially when it comes to people we are close to, it can be hard to separate our expectations from theirs. EOS 3 0 15 I feel guilty sometimes taking time to do things that I like and that are away from my family. I can see that I need to do that more, though. EOS 3 1 16 [Self-disclosure] I' ve had to learn this lesson many times with my own children. It' s difficult, but ultimately will give you some relief from your resentment.

3 1 0 [Question] Good day, how are you doing? EOS 3 0 1 Not too well. I have been depessed because of our state shut down and today an old friend from unior high school passed. EOS 3 0 5 A year is a long time when y. A year is a long time when you are 76 years old. It is really tough being restricted to not travelling. I call my parents( around your age) about once a week. EOS 3 0 7 Thank you so much for your support. It is tough and there is nothing to do. EOS 3 1 8 [Question] Do you have family you can talk to? Have you considered volunteering? I ask because my neighbor bakes for the local food bank and it helps her. EOS 3 0 9 Yes, I do, but I can' t talk to my son in Florida because he lost his job and havng tough time. I don' t feel like I should enjoy my life when he is suffering. We may need to help him financially. I use to volunteer at a nursing home, but I am afraid to now with the virus. EOS 3 1 10 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That is reasonable. And it sounds like you are doing all you can. Could you teach from home online and keep yourself safe? Or perhaps provide your son financial support? EOS 3 0 11 I am trying to do what I can for my son and also to help so I don' t get too down and depressed. EOS 3 1 12 [Affirmation and Reassurance] You are doing everything you can. Some things are just beyond our control. And we are all struggling, so please know you are not alone in your feelings. EOS 3 0 13 Thank you - that makes me feel some better. You are right and I learned more than ever that some things I con' t control. Yes, we are all struggling and trying to get this this pandemic. I am sorry that we are all going through this and pray it will get over soon. EOS 3 1 14 [Reflection of feelings] I couldn' t agree more. We will get through this with each others help.

2 0 0 Good afternoon/ evening. EOS 2 1 1 [Question] Hello, how are you tonight? EOS 2 0 2 Doing great. How about yourself? EOS 2 1 3 [Question] I' m doing well how can I help you tonight? EOS 2 0 4 So, the issue I' m having is work - related. My son had heart surgery a few months ago. He now has a pacemaker. He' s also in the middle of testing for CP. My job requires that I be around a lot of people. I always wear a mask... but sometimes the people I am with do not. Nor do they respect the 6 - foot boundary. A simple cold gives my son a fever of 103. Im scared that if I continue to work, Im putting him in danger. But if I stop, I can no longer afford bills. My son just turned 2. EOS 2 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I can see where this would be frustrating. As parents our biggest goal is to keep them safe and healthy. Have you thought about having a conversation with the people you are around to inform them you' d wish they wear a mask? EOS 2 0 6 I have. A few people respected my wishes. But one in particular stands out. A gentleman who told me he had a medical condition and proceeded to get in my face. He got angry at my request. In my shoes, what would you do? Because I feel like Im stuck between a rock and a hard place lol. EOS 2 1 7 [Reflection of feelings] I understand how you feel. Can you tell me a little more about how it makes you feel when they don' t honor your requests? EOS 2 0 8 It makes me feel trapped. Frustrated. I would never intentionally try to put someone else in harms way and I feel like I don t.* don' t get the same courtesy. I feel frustrated because I' m REQUIRED to deal with people. I work in construction. I feel trapped because, what are my options? Continue to work..... my son gets sick and dies. His pediatrician has already warned me how deadly this could be for me. And if I quit? No money? I have a 5 year old I have to take care of too.. EOS 2 1 9 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I can see exactly how frustrated you are in this situation. Before I share some ideas do you have any ideas of ways to combat this issue? EOS 2 0 10 I' ve spoken to my boss. He was sympathetic about it all.... At this point I' m not sure what to do. EOS 2 1 11 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Alright. Have you talked to your boss about working in areas where you can be around people less? Or possibly going part time for now and finding a lob that puts less danger on you and your family? EOS 2 0 12 Those are fairly decent ideas. The struggle for money would still be an issue if I worked part - time. And I doubt I could find a better job at this particular time. With that being said, I didn' t think to see if the boss would let me work in the office for a bit. I know my fellow employees would respect my wishes. Any other suggestions? EOS 2 1 13 [Affirmation and Reassurance] We are going through some really tough times right now and I think that most people are very sympathetic. Especially for those who are in your shoes. Our children are our top priority and seeing them sick hurts us more than anything. How do you feel about talking to your boss about working in the office for a bit until things calm down a little? Do you get paid vacation time in your job? EOS 2 0 14 That sounds like a reasonable thing to do. I do get paid vacation. EOS 2 1 15 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Another suggestion that I have is maybe you could take some paid vacation time now rather than later to get away from people for awhile. I know it may not be the most fun time to do it but then you know you' re keeping safe! I' m not sure of all the details on your job so I' m having a hard time making firm suggestions. How would you feel about that?

3 1 0 [Question] Good afternoon how may I help you today? EOS 3 0 1 Hello there. I' m suffering with increased depression and I' m not quite clear why. EOS 3 1 2 [Question] I' m sorry to hear that. The only thing that is different these days is lockdown. I think that' s the same for everyone. EOS 3 1 4 [Reflection of feelings] These past few months has been extremely difficult. In the past, what did you do for your depression? EOS 3 0 5 I saw a psychiatrist face to face but only once every month. I' ve always had a low mood but now I' m anxious that it will continue to get worse. EOS 3 1 6 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Talking to a professional is always ideal. Is there a way to see that psychiatrist again? EOS 3 0 7 Since lockdown haven' t spoken to her but maybe she can do a video call. At the start it was fine, I was feeling just as I always have but I don' t want this to get any worse. What if she isn' t available?. EOS 3 1 8 [Providing Suggestions or Information] It wouldn' t hurt to try and reach out. If she isn' t available, there are other services. EOS 3 0 9 What like support groups etc? I' m also sure this isn' t just related to lockdown and not seeing my specialist. It' s weird and a little concerning to be honest. EOS 3 1 10 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Not necessarily support groups, but more like psychiatry apps where a trained professional is available via chat, or video and its specifically through the app. EOS 3 0 11 I hadn' t thought of that. I know there are a few of these nowadays. EOS 3 1 12 [Affirmation and Reassurance] There a lot more since Covid began in March, so it' s worth as a backup plan if your doctor isn' t available. Sometimes its good to have options. EOS 3 0 13 I' ll start a plan and seeing if I can see my usual therapist and go from there. Sometimes it just helps talk it through depression stops you from seeing things clearly. Do you have any experience with mental health issues?. EOS 3 1 14 [Self-disclosure] After my son was born I developed Post Partem depression and anxiety. It wasn' t until almost a year and half after he was born to realize it.

2 0 0 Hey. I am really scared about my job prospects. I am really fearful about my job situation. EOS 2 1 1 [Question] When did this fear start? EOS 2 0 2 It has been a while. EOS 2 1 3 [Reflection of feelings] It sounds like your childhood trauma and the economy is the cause for you not being confident in your job situation. Is this correct? EOS 2 0 4 Somewhat. But, my fears are relevant because I don' t know if I will always have a job. EOS 2 1 5 [Question] Do you have anyone you can talk to about this? A relative or a close peer at your job? EOS 2 0 6 Do you know what I mean? What say u? I have some, but they have their own problems to deal with. Everyone has problems. Do you know what I mean? EOS 2 1 7 [Self-disclosure] You know, I once felt the same you are feeling and had the same idea that everyone had their own problems, but I took the courage to seek for help and found out that the people who really care about me will always want to help me. EOS 2 0 8 It is making me have flashbacks of other traumatic situations, I think I need to find a good support chain, for sure. What say u? You take alooonnng time to respond. EOS 2 1 9 [Providing Suggestions or Information] There are many counselors who specialize in this field of job security and especially during this pandemic and the falling economy, they are great support systems. EOS 2 0 10 I am having a hard time.... Ok, I will look some of them online. I need some financial planners to help as well. Many Americans are hurting. EOS 2 1 11 [Providing Suggestions or Information] If you want other suggestions, meditation is something that is extremely overlooked and will help you before you even take the big leap to get support from a counselor or relative. I will have to try that. Maybe it can help me ease my mind. EOS 2 1 13 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Since a lot of this stress is being caused by your childhood trauma, it seems like there is something that connects that job to your trauma and if it cant be disconnected, it seems like you should find another job. And I understand that is not the easiest in these times but I believe you can do it!

2 0 0 Good afternoon/ evening. EOS 2 1 1 [Question] Hello, how are you tonight? EOS 2 0 2 Doing great. How about yourself? EOS 2 1 3 [Question] I' m doing well how can I help you tonight? EOS 2 0 4 So, the issue I' m having is work - related. My son had heart surgery a few months ago. He now has a pacemaker. He' s also in the middle of testing for CP. My job requires that I be around a lot of people. I always wear a mask... but sometimes the people I am with do not. Nor do they respect the 6 - foot boundary. A simple cold gives my son a fever of 103. Im scared that if I continue to work, Im putting him in danger. But if I stop, I can no longer afford bills. My son just turned 2. EOS 2 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I can see where this would be frustrating. As parents our biggest goal is to keep them safe and healthy. Have you thought about having a conversation with the people you are around to inform them you' d wish they wear a mask? EOS 2 0 6 I have. A few people respected my wishes. But one in particular stands out. A gentleman who told me he had a medical condition and proceeded to get in my face. He got angry at my request. In my shoes, what would you do? Because I feel like Im stuck between a rock and a hard place lol. EOS 2 1 7 [Reflection of feelings] I understand how you feel. Can you tell me a little more about how it makes you feel when they don' t honor your requests? EOS 2 0 8 It makes me feel trapped. Frustrated. I would never intentionally try to put someone else in harms way and I feel like I don t.* don' t get the same courtesy. I feel frustrated because I' m REQUIRED to deal with people. I work in construction. I feel trapped because, what are my options? Continue to work..... my son gets sick and dies. His pediatrician has already warned me how deadly this could be for me. And if I quit? No money? I have a 5 year old I have to take care of too.. EOS 2 1 9 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I can see exactly how frustrated you are in this situation. Before I share some ideas do you have any ideas of ways to combat this issue? EOS 2 0 10 I' ve spoken to my boss. He was sympathetic about it all.... At this point I' m not sure what to do. EOS 2 1 11 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Alright. Have you talked to your boss about working in areas where you can be around people less? Or possibly going part time for now and finding a lob that puts less danger on you and your family? EOS 2 0 12 Those are fairly decent ideas. The struggle for money would still be an issue if I worked part - time. And I doubt I could find a better job at this particular time. With that being said, I didn' t think to see if the boss would let me work in the office for a bit. I know my fellow employees would respect my wishes. Any other suggestions? EOS 2 1 13 [Affirmation and Reassurance] We are going through some really tough times right now and I think that most people are very sympathetic. Especially for those who are in your shoes. Our children are our top priority and seeing them sick hurts us more than anything. How do you feel about talking to your boss about working in the office for a bit until things calm down a little? Do you get paid vacation time in your job?

EOS 4 0 9 She is inconsolable..... and me also being upset is not helping matters either. You are exactly right... it' s impossible to help. That is great advice... thank you. I know you want to be there for your friend as much as possible, and I think that will help you to move through grief at the same time, but just be mindful to not overextend yourself too much. You have to be there for yourself too.

You can create those bonds and connections with people close by to you on there first, and then when you feel comfortable enough with them you can meet up. That way it' s less awkward to hangout with someone you don' t really know. EOS 3 0 13 oh you mean chat online first, before actually meeting in person? My husband just got me a daytimer, and I write my goals in that for the new year, and I try to check it every day and try to focus on moving forward, because life has a way of throwing us curveballs like this, and we can' t get stuck in them.

You can create those bonds and connections with people close by to you on there first, and then when you feel comfortable enough with them you can meet up. 6 0 0 Hello. EOS 6 1 1 [Greeting] Good Afternoon. How are you doing troday? EOS 6 0 2 I am Ok thanks but have an unusual issue. EOS 6 1 3 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Being in a relationship with someone when you suspect unfaithful behavior is a rough thing to go through. EOS 6 0 4 Yes it is but I should be leaving her and moving on. Problem is she is a 9 and I' m a 5 and I love her. Pretty sure she is cheating though so hopefully if I ignore it she may just leave things as they are. EOS 6 1 5 [Self-disclosure] I' ve dealt with the same problem with my partner more than once. I love him very much and I found him to be a 9 to my 5 as well. However, the question of whether he was cheating or not was destroying my trust in him and everyone else not to mention what self - respect I had... I had to break down and talk to him about it. EOS 6 0 6 What happened out of interest when you had the conversation? EOS 6 1 7 [Self-disclosure] Ignoring this will NOT help things. There is NO relief in pretending a question or concern does not exist. Like I said the question has arisen more than once. The first time he owned to talking to other women, but nothing more. Since that time, he denies everything. EOS 6 0 8 I know. I' m a typical man and I like the feeling when she is on my arm. I feel like the cat that has got the cream. It' s superficial and sad I know. I knew this would never last. She is just too attractive for me. Everyone told me Iwas' punching above my weight' and now they will all be laughing if it ends.. EOS 6 1 9 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Honestly, its not anyone else' s business. IF you' re suspicions are in fact correct, then you' ve got to see that a loving and faithful 5 is better than a heart - breaking 10. However should you find that maybe the devils of insecurities are tricking you into thinking that she' s cheating, then remember that what the two of you share o= is FOR THE TWO of you. Its a relationship, not a community project! Even mu advice, albeit in the air to help you best I can. is not more important that what matters most to YOU and HER! Curiously, why do you think she' s cheating? EOS 6 0 10 I' m almost certain of it, she is super protective of her phone and never used to be. She is always texting and vague when I ask who she is messaging. She goes away with work and when she does she rarely messages me. Recently she said when was going way for a work trip for three nights but when I called her office her colleague said they got back after two.. EOS 6 1 11 [Question] Hmm... So have you two live together? How long has this kind of behavior persisted? When you ask her about this behavior, how do you present the question and how does she react? Finally, how often do you talk with her about the situation? EOS 6 0 12 That' s just it. I kind of know she is cheating but I haven' t approached it with her because I' m scared see will just leave and I' ll be a laughing stock. I suppose I' m a joke either way! EOS 6 1 13 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Don' t get me wrong, I completely understand why you have suspicions. Really I think anyone would in the same shoes... However, as humans, we tend to either assume the best or the worst of others. There' s always a margin of error present as a variable in such situations. EOS 6 0 14 very true. I suppose I have just assumed at this stage with no real evidence. do you think I should just talk to her? EOS 6 1 15 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Forgive me if this comes off as disrespectful... I only want to help you.. EOS 6 0 16 not at all. I appreciate your candour. EOS 6 1 17 [Question] But if you feel as though you' re a joke regardless, then why stay in a relationship where you' re getting hurt? I know that you don' t want to lose the beauty but would you not be happier with loyalty?

4 0 0 Hi there, are you free to talk? EOS 4 1 1 [Greeting] Hello, how can i help you today? EOS 4 0 2 I have been feeling terrible about the death of my dad. EOS 4 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That is rough, both for you and him. I know it' s meaningless to tell you not to be sad, however, you can think that he' s not in a better place. EOS 4 0 6 I presume you mean now and not not;). Though I simply am not a believer. It just made me think how meaningless life was.. EOS 4 1 7 [Self-disclosure] oh sorry, yyeah I mean now. EOS 4 1 9 [Self-disclosure] I feel you, coping with losing your loved ones is never easy. In fact, it' s confusing when you grieve and even when you recover and move on. EOS 4 0 10 Do you think that people ever really recover from a significant bereavement? I think that what you said there was very wise. EOS 4 1 11 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I don' t think people can completely get over that, you just get used to the pain of not having them around. EOS 4 0 12 Whilst it hurts to think about him being dead, I think that it would hurt more if I had totally forgotten about him and did not think about him every day. EOS 4 1 13 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I just need you to know that whatever your feeling is, it' s completely normal and you shouldn' t feel guilty for having it. EOS 4 0 14 It is just - very hard. I keep thinking about all the times I disagreed with him or did not appreciate him enough and I never got to tell him how much I loved him. EOS 4 1 19 [Question] have you considered seeking therapist? We almost never think of that service, but in a lot of case, people actually need help from professionals when grieving. EOS 6 1 9 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Honestly, its not anyone else' s business. IF you' re suspicions are in fact correct, then you' ve got to see that a loving and faithful 5 is better than a heart - breaking 10. However should you find that maybe the devils of insecurities are tricking you into thinking that she' s cheating, then remember that what the two of you share o= is FOR THE TWO of you. Its a relationship, not a community project! Even mu advice, albeit in the air to help you best I can. is not more important that what matters most to YOU and HER! Curiously, why do you think she' s cheating? EOS 6 0 10 I' m almost certain of it, she is super protective of her phone and never used to be. Recently she said when was going way for a work trip for three nights but when I called her office her colleague said they got back after two.. EOS 6 1 11 [Question] Hmm... So have you two live together? How long has this kind of behavior persisted? When you ask her about this behavior, how do you present the question and how does she react? Finally, how often do you talk with her about the situation? EOS 6 0 12 That' s just it. I kind of know she is cheating but I haven' t approached it with her because I' m scared see will just leave and I' ll be a laughing stock. I suppose I' m a joke either way! EOS 6 1 13 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Don' t get me wrong, I completely understand why you have suspicions. Really I think anyone would in the same shoes... I suppose I have just assumed at this stage with no real evidence. do you think I should just talk to her? EOS 6 1 15 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Forgive me if this comes off as disrespectful... I only want to help you.. EOS 6 0 16 not at all. I appreciate your candour. EOS 6 1 17 [Question] But if you feel as though you' re a joke regardless, then why stay in a relationship where you' re getting hurt? I know that you don' t want to lose the beauty but would you not be happier with loyalty? EOS 6 0 18 All this is tied up with who and I know I' m valuing the wrong things. You are right actually. I think some of this comes from my low self - esteem. having a 9 helps with that. but maybe I need to deal with it directly. EOS 6 1 19 [Reflection of feelings] I wholly believe you should gently but steadfastly confront her. I absolutely do not mean to suggest a dispute or argument. That will not help either. Simply ask her about the things that you KNOW aren' t acceptable; lying about how long her trip was is one of them. Also, its okay to talk about how that stuff makes you feel, but try not to project your feelings as her fault. I know that it seems like they are... But she didn' t MAKE you feel any specific way, even if her ACTIONS influenced how you were already feeling..

3 0 0 Hello I am very sad today. My partner is cheating on me. EOS 3 1 1 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] Cheating on you? EOS 3 0 2 Yes. With another woman. EOS 3 1 3 [Question] How do you know that your partner is cheating on you? Did he tell you that he is? EOS 3 0 4 I was told by a customer at work. I do not know this person well, yet they knew the person he was cheating on me with. He will not admit it himself. EOS 3 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I am sorry if your partner is cheating. So, your partner denies the charge of cheating? Are you and your partner married? EOS 3 0 6 Yes. He says the person who told me is lying. We are not married but we live together. EOS 3 1 7 [Question] How long have you been in a relationship with your man? EOS 3 0 8 2 years. EOS 3 1 9 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] So, 2 years should be long enough to know if your partner has been cheating. EOS 3 0 10 What do you mean exactly?. EOS 3 1 11 [Question] Are you someone who trusts people? I think that most men would fess up about it. EOS 3 0 12 I guess all people are different. I generally trust people easily. EOS 3 1 13 [Question] Does he show affection to you? If he is adamant about loving you, then, it may be false allegations. EOS 3 0 14 That is true. He is but, has been distant lately. EOS 3 1 15 [Self-disclosure] I have had coworkers lie and be jealous that I have a good relationship with my partner. EOS 3 0 16 Do you think maybe it was a rumor started by someone who could be jealous?. EOS 3 1 17 [Question] Ash your partner if he loves you enough to propose marriage. If he says no, then ask him why. EOS 3 0 18 That is a good point.. EOS 3 1 19 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Yes, workers can be a real problem and can make up stories about people. Slander in the work place happens. Unfortunately, lies and rumors are just that. EOS 3 0 20 I am not sure if I am okay with giving him an ultimatum. We are still young and although I love being in a relationship, I am unsure about marriage. But I appreciate your suggestions. and you make a great point about the workplace being hostile. EOS 3 1 21 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Sure, I understand. EOS 3 0 22 I should trust my partner more than any random person. EOS 3 1 23 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] Yes, the workplace is not like home life.. Yes, trust matters. EOS 3 0 24 But every time i bring it up, he tries to change the subject. How should I approach him to communicate better? EOS 3 1 25 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I would see if he wants to spend time doing things like volunteering after work. If he says yes, or is excited, that is a good sign that he wants to be with you.... even after work. EOS 3 0 26 okay! that is a good idea. Maybe I can research something and see if there is anything new we can do together. EOS 3 1 27 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Find things that he has in common or energize the relationship. Yes, ask him if he wants to learn to swing dance or take skiing lessons or volunteer for Habitat for Humanity. EOS 3 0 28 That is a good point. It is just hard to go on with the relationship when I feel I do not know the whole truth and there is little discussion or reassurance. EOS 3 1 29 [Affirmation and Reassurance] You have done your part, but if he wants to show you affection on a regular basis, that is a good sign. How old are the both of you? EOS 3 0 30 Okay. I will keep that in mind. We are 22. EOS 3 1 31 [Question] Are you intimate with your partner, on a regular basis? EOS 3 0 32 Yes but less over the past few months. EOS 3 1 33 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Spicing up the live life can also help to energize hings. I mean, the love life. Te lack in the last few months could be a physical issue or stress related.... for him. Does he mention a lot of stress at the job or is he in college? 22 is young. You are both relatively young. I feel that there is plenty to learn about each other. EOS 3 0 34 That' s understandable. Maybe I can communicate with him first. EOS 3 1 35 [Providing Suggestions or Information] How do you all generally communicate? Through text? EOS 3 0 36 He is going to law school and I am going to med school. There is a ton of stress on both ends.. EOS 3 1 37 [Question] Which do you and your man like to communicate? EOS 3 0 38 No live together so we use call, text, and see each other in person. I communicate much more than he does. Thats why I think he is hiding something. EOS 3 1 39 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Well, you and your man are under a lot of stress, so keep that in mind. The study may be making him withdraw a lot. EOS 3 0 40 You are right. I will try to be more sensitive about that. Thank you for your help.. EOS 3 1 41 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I would ask his fellow students, if you know any of them if they think he really loves you. EOS 3 0 42 Do you think getting other people involved is a good idea? EOS 3 1 43 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I would be subtle about that tactic.. If you haven' t met any of his school mates. I wouldn' t pursue that option. Have you met any of his class mates? EOS 3 0 44 Yeah he has a few close friends but he is pretty to himself. We both live far away from home. EOS 3 1 45 [Question] Are you and him directly off campuses in housing? You both attend the same college, correct? EOS 3 0 46 Yes off campus. Same college. EOS 3 1 47 [Question] Where do you work? Have you seen the customer who said that your partner was cheating? Seen the customer before? Was it a man or woman who dropped the shocking news? I feel that the customer may have a case of mistaken identity indeed.

Sometimes being clear with your own expectations can help him to see what won' t be accepted from him as long as he is living in your home. EOS 3 0 13 Yes, I could do better at that. 6 0 0 Hello, how are you? EOS 6 1 1 [Question] Hi there! How may I support you? EOS 6 0 2 Well, I' m really upset with my friends. EOS 6 1 3 [Others] I am so sorry to hear that. Did something happen? EOS 6 0 4 Yes, they aren' t taking COVID seriously. EOS 6 1 5 [Self-disclosure] Oh that is so hard. I have family that isn' t taking COVID seriously as well, and its so frustrating to see. Are you able to talk to them about your concerns? EOS 6 0 6 Yes but they get angry with me. I don' t know how to get through to them, EOS 6 1 7 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Some people express their frustrations in certain ways. Do you think there is another way to communicate with them? It' s also okay to stand up for yourself and stand by what you feel is right. EOS 6 0 8 I really don' t know I just haven' t been seeing them at all but I see through social media that they have large parties but I do feel left out. It' s a weird dynamic. EOS 6 1 9 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] It sounds like you' re finding it hard to balance the isolation you feel during this pandemic, while you know it' s the safest option, with the social gatherings your friends are having. Does that sound right? EOS 6 0 10 That' s exactly right. EOS 6 1 11 [Affirmation and Reassurance] that is such a hard position to be in. it sounds like you are doing your best by choosing to be safe and keep your distance. EOS 6 0 12 I' d like to think so but I wish they would too. It' s hard to know what is right. EOS 6 1 13 [Self-disclosure] I have found that having vitural movie nights, or going on socially distanced walks with my pals has been so helpful with staying connected. Is this something you think your friends would be willing to try? EOS 6 0 14 Yes, but they' ll have their BBQs and parties anyway. They are having a group Thanksgiving and there will be a lot of people there. My husband and I feel bad that we aren' t going, but we also know it isn' t smart. EOS 6 1 15 [Providing Suggestions or Information] I think a lot of people are going by the notion that you can' t live your life in fear, and that they' re going to have these big family gathering regardless of what is happening with COVID. The stats have shown that after holidays the cases have surged, for example, memorial day, 4th of July, labor day. But I think its important to remember the bigger picture that peoples lives are literally at stake and the people that disregard need to be more aware. EOS 6 0 16 We feel like after this is all over, they will still remind us that we were standoffish during this time. And I agree. The longer we put it off and don' t take it seriously, the longer it will last. EOS 6 1 17 [Reflection of feelings] Can you tell them that that just isn' t the case? You and your husband are making the right choice by staying home for the safety of yourselves and others. If I am correct, it has nothing to do with the fact that you don' t want to see your pals and family! From chatting with you it sounds like your relationships with these people is incredibly important to you. EOS 6 0 18 Yes that' s totally accurate. Yes they are. They are good people. They just think living for the moment is the bigger picture. EOS 6 1 19 [Greeting] I hope your friends can see how important they are to you and thats a huge reason why you' re not seeing them. EOS 6 0 20 I think they do. They just think that this is a hoax. EOS 6 1 21 [Self-disclosure] I know a lot of people that think the same thing. I have one friend who thought that, and they ended up contracting COVID. Thankfully she was ok, but after she got it she definitely didn' t think it was a hoax anymore. I hope they understand the risk they are taking. EOS 6 0 22 That' s scary. Yeah I don' t think they get it. EOS 6 1 23 [Greeting] I am proud of the choices you are making and I hope you can take some comfort in knowing that you are doing your part in helping keep things under control. There is a strength in numbers and the more people who understand that the faster it can be controlled.

4 0 0 Hi I am so sad my boyfriend was cheating and broke up with me when I found out. I don' t think I can ever be happy again. EOS 4 0 6 I thought I was a good girlfriend, I was loyal, nice to his friends, kept the house nice, cooked for him, he never said he was unhappy he just started having to work nights and weekends a lot with no overtime he said he was salary now. EOS 4 1 7 [Providing Suggestions or Information] have you tried getting back out there and dating again? just because he didn' t want to have an honest relationship with you, doesn' t mean that nobody else does. also in my message above I have made a couple of autocorrect errors, apologies for that. EOS 4 0 8 I trusted what he told me despite my gut feeling which turned out to be right. I thought we were so perfect together, I don' t want him back I could never trust him again, I am not sure I could trust any guy right now, I am so hurt and confused. I don' t ever want to feel like this again. EOS 4 1 9 [Providing Suggestions or Information] relationship issues, especially when they and suddenly can be one of the most stressful periods in an adults life. you are not alone in that other people have been through similar experiences themselves. EOS 4 0 10 This was the first guy I ever lived with, I thought we would get married one day. How do people make it through the pain, it actually hurts. EOS 4 1 11 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Do you have someone who you can talk to about this to support you?. EOS 4 0 12 I have a couple acquaintances at work but I wouldn' t want to discuss my personal life with, my mom said to have a good cry but I almost couldn' t stop once I started. EOS 4 1 13 [Providing Suggestions or Information] Ok I understand. It is normal to be upset in a situation like this. When I ask if there is someone to talk to, I meant perhaps a friend or someone who has experienced a similar breakup. There are also support groups out there that can really help. Getting your emotions out and seeing that others struggle with the same issue may be a very good thing. EOS 4 0 14 Have you ever had a break up of a serious relationship or know someone who has? Does the aching inside ever get better? How long will it take? EOS 4 1 15 [Self-disclosure] When I was younger, my girlfriend cheated on me. We were together for 4 years. For me, it turned to anger not sadness, I was so angry that she did that to me. I realised that if she was capable of doing this, it' s better that I found out now, rather than when we were engaged or married. I loved her but after she cheated, I couldn' t stand the sight of her. I completely understand the feelings you are experiencing. The good news is that I have since met someone wonderful, we have children and I am now very happy.
